text: A ghuava Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven ghugha God ganɨngizir bretba ame. A da apava, uaghan maba isa uan gumazibagh anɨngizɨma, me uaghan ame. Dughiar kam Abiatar, ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim itima, Devit dame. Judabar arazir kam iti. Bretɨn kaba ofa gamir gumazibara dapi, gumazir kɨniba puvatɨ. Ezɨ Devit, gumazir kɨnim, bretɨn kaba ame.”
